CONFIG_NOT_SET: WARNING: Unable to persist server configuration. They will be reverted upon bot restart.
CHANNEL_NOT_SET: WARNING: Channel to send notifications is not set. Please use !channel [channel] to configure it.
TEST_MSG: I have permission to send messages to the channel {{{ channel }}}.
TEST_FAIL: I DON'T have permissions to send messages to the configured channel.

KILL.SOLO_1: And it was a solo kill.

BATTLE.EVENT: A battle ocurred between {{ guilds }} guilds!
BATTLE.DESCRIPTION:
Players: {{ players }} / Kills: {{ kills }} / Fame: {{ fame }}
Duration: {{ duration }}

HELP.CHANNEL: Sets the channel to send notifications.
HELP.LIST: Lists tracked players, guilds and alliances.
HELP.TRACK: Tracks a player, guild or alliance.
HELP.UNTRACK: Stops tracking a player, guild or alliance.
HELP.TEST: Verify if the bot has permission to send messages.

CHANNEL.NO_CHANNEL: Please input a channel for notifications.
CHANNEL.NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I can't find the mentioned channel. Please verifiy if I have acess to it and try again.

TRACK.MISSING_PARAMETERS: Please insert all parameters. Type !help to see more.
TRACK.UNSUPPORTED_TYPE: Unsupported type of tracking. Type !help to see more.
TRACK.ALLIANCE_DISABLED: Sorry, tracking of alliances is disabled for now. Please contact bot admin for more information.
TRACK.NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't find anything with this name.
TRACK.ALREADY_TRACKED: I am already tracking this item.
TRACK.LIMIT_REACHED: You already reached the limit of {{ limit }} items in this list.
